name: JAWS Key Map File
summary: Learn about .JKM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: JKM files use a plain text, comma delimited format. They store the hotkey codes and the corresponding function names that are run when the hotkeys are invoked.
NOTE: JKM files are edited using the Keyboard Manager, which is included with JAWS.

description: File used by JAWS, a screen reading program that enables text to speech functionality in Windows; saves keystroke assignments that act as hotkeys for interacting with the JAWS software; may be the default key map used by the software or a custom user-defined key map.
